@jacobhankal wrote:

ok im trying to code blood barrage and this is what im doing and its making the cube of ice like ice barrage what is wrong with this one?

{ if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { startAnimation(1979); calculateMagicHit(30); hitDiff = MageDamage; inCombat(); PkingDelay = 7; stayStill(); if(hitDiff >= 0 && hitDiff <= 200) { stillgfx(368, absY, absX); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); } else { stillgfx(85, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); } } }
